parameters.name: API_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the Cloud Controller API for access by cluster components.

parameters.name: BLOBSTORE_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the webdav server used by the Cloud Controller for storing artifacts (e.g. droplets, buildpacks).

parameters.name: blobstore-password
parameters.description: The basic auth password that Cloud Controller uses to connect to the blobstore server. Auto-generated if not provided. Passwords must be alphanumeric (URL-safe).

parameters.name: blobstore-secure-link
parameters.description: The secret used for signing URLs between Cloud Controller and blobstore.

parameters.name: AUTOSCALER_API_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the Autoscaler API.

parameters.name: AUTOSCALER_SERVER_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the Autoscaler Server.

parameters.name: AUTOSCALER_SERVICE_BROKER_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname for the Autoscaler Service Broker.

parameters.name: autoscaler-password
parameters.description: The Autoscaler API password. Auto-generated if not provided. Passwords must be alphanumeric (URL-safe).

parameters.name: CONSUL_HCF_CLUSTER_CONFIG_REVISION
parameters.description: An indicator to increment when changing the number of consul hosts in the cluster, to properly trigger HCP component restarts.

parameters.name: DIEGO_DATABASE_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the first etcd server used to manage HCF state. Auto-generated if not provided.

parameters.name: DIEGO_ACCESS_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of Diego file server.

parameters.name: DIEGO_CC_BRIDGE_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname for server managing staging task callbacks.

parameters.name: DIEGO_BRAIN_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the Diego auctioneer API server.

parameters.name: DIEGO_CELL_MEMORY_CAPACITY_MB
parameters.description: The memory capacity the cell should manage. If this capacity is larger than the actual memory of the cell component, over-provisioning will occur.

parameters.name: DEFAULT_APP_DISK_IN_MB
parameters.description: The standard amount of disk (in MB) given to an application when not overriden by the user via manifest, command line, etc.

parameters.name: DEFAULT_APP_MEMORY
parameters.description: The standard amount of memory (in MB) given to an application when not overriden by the user via manifest, command line, etc.

parameters.name: DROPLET_MAX_STAGED_STORED
parameters.description: The number of versions of an application to keep. You will be able to rollback to this amount of versions.

parameters.name: DNS_HEALTH_CHECK_HOST
parameters.description: The host to ping for confirmation of DNS resolution.

parameters.name: NATS_HCF_CLUSTER_CONFIG_REVISION
parameters.description: An indicator to increment when changing the number of NATS hosts in the cluster, to properly trigger HCP component restarts.

parameters.name: MYSQL_PROXY_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the MySQL proxy for the UAA database.

parameters.name: MYSQL_HCF_CLUSTER_CONFIG_REVISION
parameters.description: An indicator to increment when changing the number of MySQL hosts in the cluster, to properly trigger HCP component restarts.

parameters.name: MYSQL_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the MySQL server for the UAA database.

parameters.name: ETCD_HCF_CLUSTER_CONFIG_REVISION
parameters.description: An indicator to increment when changing the number of etcd hosts in the cluster, to properly trigger HCP component restarts.

parameters.name: ETCD_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the first etcd server used to manage HCF state.

parameters.name: CONSUL_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of first consul server used to manage HCF state.

parameters.name: ROUTER_HOST
parameters.description: Part of: Array of router IPs.

parameters.name: ROUTING_API_HOST
parameters.description: Part of: Must be the internal DNS name for the etcd cluster when require_ssl:true. When require_ssl:false either a DNS name or an array of IP addresses is supported.

parameters.name: LOGGREGATOR_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname for the Traffic controller API.

parameters.name: CF_USB_BROKER_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname of the Universal Service Broker's API.

parameters.name: bulk-api-password
parameters.description: The password for the bulk api.

parameters.name: ccdb-role-password
parameters.description: The password for access to the Cloud Controller database.

parameters.name: cf-usb-password
parameters.description: The password for access to the Universal Service Broker.

parameters.name: CLUSTER_ADMIN_AUTHORITIES
parameters.description: The Oauth2 authorities available to the cluster administrator.

parameters.name: cluster-admin-password
parameters.description: The password for the cluster administrator.

parameters.name: consul-encryption-keys
parameters.description: Part of: A list of passphrases that will be converted into encryption keys, the first key in the list is the active one.

parameters.name: db-encryption-key
parameters.description: key for encrypting sensitive values in the Cloud Controller database.

parameters.name: DOMAIN
parameters.description: Base domain of the HCF cluster.

parameters.name: TCP_DOMAIN
parameters.description: TCP routing domain of the HCF cluster.

parameters.name: HCF_SSO_HOST
parameters.description: The hostname where the route service can be found.

parameters.name: hcf-sso-password
parameters.description: The password for access to the HCF SSO service broker.

parameters.name: HCF_SSO_OAUTH_AUTHORIZE_URL
parameters.description: The OAuth authorization URL for SSO; defaults to using the same UAA as HCF

parameters.name: HCF_SSO_OAUTH_ID
parameters.description: The OAuth client id for SSO; defaults to the HCF-built-in client for UAA

parameters.name: HCF_SSO_OAUTH_TOKEN_URL
parameters.description: The OAuth token URL for SSO; defaults to using the same UAA as HCF

parameters.name: HCF_SSO_OAUTH_VERIFICATION_KEY
parameters.description: The OAuth verification key for SSO; defaults to using the same UAA as HCF

parameters.name: loggregator-shared-secret
parameters.description: Shared secret used to verify cryptographically signed dropsonde messages.

parameters.name: monit-password
parameters.description: Password used for the monit API.

parameters.name: nats-password
parameters.description: The password for access to NATS.

parameters.name: staging-upload-password
parameters.description: The password for access to the uploader of staged droplets.

parameters.name: internal-api-password
parameters.description: Basic auth password for access to the Cloud Controller's internal API.

parameters.name: TRUSTED_CERTS
parameters.description: Concatenation of trusted CA certificates to be made available on the cell.

parameters.name: uaa-admin-client-secret
parameters.description: The password of the admin client - a client named admin with uaa.admin as an authority.

parameters.name: uaa-cc-client-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the Cloud Controller.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-doppler-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by doppler.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-gorouter-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the gorouter.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-hcf-sso-secret
parameters.description: The OAuth client secret for SSO; defaults to a randomly generated value

parameters.name: uaa-clients-login-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the login client.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-cc-routing-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the Routing API.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-cc-service-secret
parameters.description: Used for generating SSO clients for service brokers.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-cf-usb-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the Universal Service Broker.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-diego-ssh-proxy-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the SSH proxy.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-hcf-auto-config-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the task creating the cluster administrator user

parameters.name: uaa-clients-tcp-emitter-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the TCP emitter.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-tcp-router-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the TCP router.

parameters.name: bbs-active-key-passphrase
parameters.description: The password for access to the diego BBS database.

parameters.name: mysql-admin-password
parameters.description: The password for the MySQL server admin user.

parameters.name: mysql-cluster-health-password
parameters.description: The password for the cluster logger health user.

parameters.name: mysql-proxy-admin-password
parameters.description: The password for Basic Auth used to secure the MySQL proxy API.

parameters.name: mysql-diego-password
parameters.description: The password for access to MySQL by diego.

parameters.name: mysql-galera-healthcheck-endpoint-password
parameters.description: The password used to contact the sidecar endpoints via Basic Auth.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-cloud-controller-username-lookup-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the Cloud Controller for fetching usernames.

parameters.name: uaadb-password
parameters.description: The password for access to the UAA database.

parameters.name: DIEGO_CELL_SUBNET
parameters.description: A CIDR subnet mask specifying the range of subnets available to be assigned to containers.

parameters.name: DIEGO_CELL_NETWORK_MTU
parameters.description: Maximum network transmission unit length in bytes for application containers.

parameters.name: etcd-peer-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded peer key.

parameters.name: etcd-peer-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded peer certificate.

parameters.name: etcd-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server key.

parameters.name: etcd-client-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client key.

parameters.name: etcd-server-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server certificate.

parameters.name: etcd-client-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client certificate.

parameters.name: doppler-server-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server certificate

parameters.name: doppler-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server key

parameters.name: metron-client-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client key

parameters.name: metron-client-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client certificate.

parameters.name: bbs-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client key.

parameters.name: bbs-client-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client key.

parameters.name: bbs-server-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client certificate.

parameters.name: bbs-client-crt
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client certificate.

parameters.name: BBS_ADVERTISEMENT_BASE_HOSTNAME
parameters.description: Suffix for the BBS advertised hostname.

parameters.name: ssh-key
parameters.description: PEM encoded RSA private key used to identify host.

parameters.name: app-ssh-host-key-fingerprint
parameters.description: MD5 fingerprint of the host key of the SSH proxy that brokers connections to application instances.

parameters.name: router-services-secret
parameters.description: Support for route services is disabled when no value is configured. A robust passphrase is recommended.

parameters.name: router-ssl-cert
parameters.description: The public ssl cert for ssl termination.

parameters.name: router-ssl-key
parameters.description: The private ssl key for ssl termination.

parameters.name: haproxy-ssl-cert-key
parameters.description: SSL certificate (PEM file).

parameters.name: router-status-password
parameters.description: Password for HTTP basic auth to the varz/status endpoint.

parameters.name: uaa-private-key
parameters.description: The server's ssl private key. Only passphrase-less keys are supported.

parameters.name: uaa-certificate
parameters.description: The server's ssl certificate. The default is a self-signed certificate and should always be replaced for production deployments.

parameters.name: blobstore-tls-cert
parameters.description: The PEM-encoded certificate (optionally as a certificate chain) for serving blobs over TLS/SSL.

parameters.name: blobstore-tls-key
parameters.description: The PEM-encoded private key for signing TLS/SSL traffic.

parameters.name: consul-agent-cert
parameters.description: PEM-encoded agent certificate.

parameters.name: consul-agent-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded client key.

parameters.name: consul-server-cert
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server certificate.

parameters.name: consul-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server key.

parameters.name: demophon-server-cert
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server certificate.

parameters.name: demophon-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded server key.

parameters.name: SKIP_CERT_VERIFY_INTERNAL
parameters.description: Determines whether dashboard verifies SSL certificates when communicating with Cloud Controller and UAA.

parameters.name: SKIP_CERT_VERIFY_EXTERNAL
parameters.description: Skip TLS verification when communicating with UAA system domain.

parameters.name: GARDEN_LINUX_DNS_SERVER
parameters.description: Override DNS servers to be used in containers; defaults to the same as the host.

parameters.name: internal-ca-cert
parameters.description: PEM-encoded CA certificate used to sign TLS certificate hosted by Diego BBS.

parameters.name: sso-route-cert
parameters.description: Certificate for the SSO service.

parameters.name: sso-route-key
parameters.description: Key for the SSO service.

parameters.name: cf-usb-broker-server-cert
parameters.description: PEM-encoded broker server certificate.

parameters.name: cf-usb-broker-server-key
parameters.description: PEM-encoded broker server key.

parameters.name: autoscaler-couchdb-password
parameters.description: the password.

parameters.name: uaa-clients-cf-autoscaler-secret
parameters.description: The password for UAA access by the Autoscaler.
